findings.title: approve Function Vulnerability
findings.description: The approve function has a potential vulnerability.

findings.title: Transfer Function Vulnerability
findings.description: The transfer function has a vulnerability related to fee on transfer tokens.

findings.title: transferFrom
findings.description: Potential vulnerability in transferFrom function allowing unauthorized token transfers

findings.title: Unprotected mint Function
findings.description: The mint function is marked as external and does not have any access modifiers, making it vulnerable to unauthorized access.

findings.title: _burn Function Vulnerability
findings.description: Potential vulnerability found in the _burn function.

findings.title: Unprotected Swap Functions
findings.description: Multiple unprotected swap functions are present in the contract, which can lead to potential security risks.

findings.title: Skim Function
findings.description: The skim function has been marked as a potential security risk.

findings.title: Unprotected Sync Function
findings.description: The sync function does not have any access modifiers or reentrancy protection, which can lead to potential security risks.

findings.title: Uninitialized Variables
findings.description: The constructor does not initialize state variables.

findings.title: _transfer
findings.description: Potential reentrancy vulnerability in internal _transfer function.

findings.title: _beforeTokenTransfer
findings.description: Potential reentrancy vulnerability or unintended behavior due to lack of access control in internal function.

findings.title: <Constructor>
findings.description: The constructor function has unrestricted access and can modify state.
